column4: I have a Fujitsu Siemens E8110 laptop with 1gb ram and 2x Intel T2400 1,83GHz. If I buy 2gb ram more so I got 3gb ram, will I see a hughe diffrence in how fast my laptop runs?
or should I buy the new mac that comes today?
you probly will see no difference, unless you're running a lot of apps
